headline: Dividend Growth and Stability: What Keeps Philip Morris (PM) Among the Best Performing in 2025 Dividend Stocks
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is included among the 15 Best Performing Dividend Stocks So Far in 2025. Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) was created in 2007 when it split from Altria, taking over the same brands, including Marlboro, but operating them in markets outside the US.
